info.author: Michael Kluge
info.description: wget is used to locate and download URI resources

param.name: uri
param.description: one ore more URI(s) pointing to the resource(s) to download

param.name: output
param.description: path to a folder in which the downloaded files should be stored; filename remains untouched

param.name: rename
param.description: renames the file to that name; multiple names must be provided in case of multiple URIs

param.name: disableSizeCheck
param.description: flag that can be used to disable the size check that checks if a file is greater than 1KB

var.name: downloadedFolder
var.description: path to the folder in which the files were stored

var.name: numberOfFiles
var.description: number of files that were downloaded

var.name: downloadedFiles
var.description: absolute path to the downloaded file(s) separated by ','
